mapper.select: select u.id, u.name, u.age, s.name school_name, a.name academy_name, m.name major_name, c.name clazz_name from user u left join school s on u.school_id = s.id left join academy a on u.academy_id = a.id left join major m on u.major_id = m.id left join clazz c on u.clazz_id = c.id where u.id = ${id}
